Key Match Events: Kwadwo Duah scored the opening goal for Switzerland after 12 minutes
Michel Aebischer doubled the Swiss lead on the stroke of half-time with a superb curling shot
Barnab√°s Varga scored for Hungary in the 66th minute
Breel Embolo sealed the win for Switzerland in stoppage time
Post-Match Reflections: Swiss coach Murat Yakin praised his team's tactics and performance
Hungary coach Marco Rossi acknowledged his team's errors and took responsibility
Miscellaneous Highlights: Granit Xhaka was named the player of the match
Switzerland were desperate for a strong start to the tournament after a poor qualifying campaign
Others: The match took place at RheinEnergieSTADION in Cologne, Germany
Slavko Vincici was the referee for the match
